Hi there,

I have some problems with relative URIs (Heritrix 1.8). The foll=
owing
is happening:

A page like "http://a.site.com/contents.php" is downlo=
aded. It
contains relatives links like "<a href=3D?param1=3D11&param2=3D22>=
, and has
not a base element in head section. The HTML link extractor is
re=
turning links like "http://a.site.com/?param1=3D11&param2=3D22". Isn't
that=
 wrong?. Shouldn't be the links like
"http://a.site.com/contents.php?param1=
=3D11&param2=3D22"?.

By the way, in browsers, the resulting links are like=
 the last one.

Thanks very much,

tizo
